tagOptionList.apply:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to apply selected tag filters
**UI Location**: Student Tracks List → Tag Filter popup → Footer
**When Users See This**: After making selections in the tag filter popup
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Apply"
tagOptionList.close:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to close the tag filter popup without applying changes
**UI Location**: Student Tracks List → Tag Filter popup → Footer
**When Users See This**: When the tag filter popup is open
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Close"
updateExerciseNotice.exerciseUpdated:
**Functional Purpose**: Alert message informing the user that an exercise has been updated
**UI Location**: Exercise page (top bar)
**When Users See This**: When viewing an exercise that has a newer version available
**Technical Context**: The text suggests updating and re-running tests. No variables.
**Current English**: "This exercise has been updated. Update to the latest version and see if your tests still pass."
updateExerciseNotice.seeWhatsChanged:
**Functional Purpose**: Link to view the changes in an updated exercise
**UI Location**: Exercise page → Update notice bar
**When Users See This**: When an exercise has been updated and the update notice is displayed
**Technical Context**: This acts as a faux link to open a modal. No variables.
**Current English**: "See what's changed…"
